sentences.sentence: Thousands of students have taken part in demonstrations.
sentences.translation: 成千上万的学生参加了游行。

sentences.sentence: Lectures will be interspersed with practical demonstrations.
sentences.translation: 讲课中将不时插入实际示范。

sentences.sentence: The government responded by banning all future demonstrations.
sentences.translation: 政府的反应是今后禁止一切示威活动。
